useCase.name: Manage Categories

successEndConditions.condition: The new category is successfully added.

useCase.trigger: The Encargado selects the option to manage categories.

mainSequence.step: MenuEncargado displays the Categories menu to the Encargado.
Encargado selects to add a new category.
MenuEncargado requests data for the new category.
Encargado confirms to add the new category.
MenuEncargado shows a confirmation message to the Encargado.
